metadata.name: Earmarking Category
metadata.description: This codelist has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist.

1.name: Unearmarked
1.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes A,B or C.

2.name: Softly Earmarked
2.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes D,E or F.

3.name: Earmarked
3.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes G or H.

4.name: Tightly Earmarked
4.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes I,J or K.
